title: WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Junior Assistant Posts
description: The Water Resources, Power, and Infrastructure Sectors (WAPCOS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Junior Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appli...
